entry.label: Full
entry.help: Server sends (e.g.): Server: Apache/2.0.41 (Unix) PHP/4.2.2 MyMod/1.2

entry.label: On
entry.help: Adds a line with the server version number and ServerName of the serving virtual host.

entry.label: Off
entry.help: Suppresses the footer line (compatible with behaviour of Apache-1.2 and below.

entry.label: E-Mail
entry.help: Adds a line with "mailto:" reference to the ServerAdmin of the referenced document.

entry.label: Off
entry.help: Does not permit TRACE requests. Returns error 405 (Method not allowed) to the client.

entry.label: Extended
entry.help: The core will reflect the full headers and all chunk headers with the response body. This can be used for testing and diagnostic purposes only.

entry.label: Allow,Deny
entry.help: First, all Allow directives are evaluated; at least one must match, or the request is rejected. Next, all Deny directives are evaluated. If any matches, the request is rejected. Last, any requests which do not match an Allow or a Deny directive are denied by default.

entry.label: Deny,Allow
entry.help: First, all Deny directives are evaluated; if any match, the request is denied unless it also matches an Allow directive. Any requests which do not match any Allow or Deny directives are permitted.
